bug.author: zhangqianhui
bug.summary: Compiling the master branch suffer some errors
bug.description: 1.in vs 2013 , (1) fatal error C1128: Please compile it useing "/bigobj" (2)error C3861: “alignof”: can't find the identifier 2. in vs12 and vs14 , have the same problem: “picotest/picotest.h”: No such file or directory for 1 , I have solved it!

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/zhangqianhui>@zhangqianhui</denchmark-link>
Thanks for your report, compile errors on msvc2013 are fixed. As for picotest, you need to use command to execute unit tests. see: <denchmark-link:http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10168449/git-update-submodule-recursive/10168693>http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10168449/git-update-submodule-recursive/10168693</denchmark-link>
